upg_popup_body:
Они могут быть интегрированы выбором одного из значков на блестящих спиралях на карте. 

  Или вы можете кликнуть сюда или нажать _ что-бы перейти к ближайшему. 

  Всего интегрировано обновлений: _
gold_body:
Используется для постройки структур и получения обновлений. 

  Каждую секунду вы получаете 1 золота за каждые 100 открытых тайлов.

  Текущий доход: _
info_body:
Сложность растет со временем

  Цена увеличивается со сложностью и количеством строений

autoshields_ttp_body:
Каждые 15 секунд, _ генераторов брони строятся на случайном пустом строении. 

  Приоритет неэкраниронных строений.  

 Текущая сумма: _

vortex_ttp_body:
Когда противник, пораженный заморозкой убит, у него есть _ шанс взорваться в холодном вихре для каждой пачки крио. 

  Вихрь воздействует на каждого врага в _ радиусе, нанося _ урон турели и передавая по стекам Крио умершего врага.

deathSpark_ttp_body:
Когда враг убит, создается сфера статической энергии, которая пытается поразить _ существо в радиусе _ тайлов. Наносимый урон основан на улучшении генераторов брони, умноженных на _

Одно случайное улучшение выбирается и применяется каждые _ секунд, в зависимости от его редкости.

  Количество клонов: _
skills_UI_hover_body:
These can be obtained like regular upgrades and can used by clicking them or pressing the hotkeys _

  When obtaining a new skill, it will fill the slot highlighted in red, you can right click a slot or skill to change which slot is selected for replacement.

  You cannot have more than one copy of a skill.

  You currently have _ slots.
config_main_sfx_ttp_body: Music too lound? Can't hear your own thought with all that cannon fire going on? You came to the right place!
config_main_gfx_ttp_body: Game too laggy? Too ugly? Fix it here.
config_main_controls_ttp_body: Here you can change which keys do what, useful indeed.
config_main_gameplay_ttp_body: Here are the settings that actually interfere with how the game is played.
config_discord_body: Click to join our discord to talk with our awesome community, give feedback to our developers or watch Verde getting wrecked by monsters of his own creation.
config_steam_body: Oh no! The game has changed and you don't know what is new. No problems there, friend. By clicking here you can see the latest patch notes and announcements.
config_gameplay_quickbuy_ttp_body:
Disables regular hotkeys for buildings.

  Instead, _ will build a tile in the current position of the mouse, _ will place a turret, _ will place a shield generator and _ will sell the building.
config_gfx_particles_ttp_body:
Sets the current maximum amount of particles allowed by the game.

  When above 50% of this threshold, particles will have a linear chance of not generating, which will become 100% when the number of particles reach that threshold.

  Reducing this setting should increase FPS slightly.

Sets whatever the game is fullscreen or not.

  Should not impact performance.
config_gfx_resolution_ttp_body:
Sets the current texture resolution, which translates to how many pixels wide a tile is in maximum zoom.

  Keep in mind that changing this setting will re-render the entire map and cause a lag spike.

  Reducing this setting should decrease GPU memory usage dramatically and increase FPS slightly.
unlocks_big_ttp_body: Have at least _ buildings at the same time.
unlocks_branch_ttp_body: Have _ buildings depend on just one to stay alive.
unlocks_damage_ttp_body: Deal _ damage in a single run.
unlocks_defended_ttp_body: Have _ shield protecting a single building.
unlocks_frozen_ttp_body: Have _ stacks of cryo on a single enemy.
unlocks_gofar_ttp_body: Create a building that is _ tiles away from where you started
unlocks_hurt_ttp_body: Deal _ damage in a single hit.
unlocks_lochaz_ttp_body: Kill a total of _ creatures across all matches.
unlocks_masterbait_ttp_body: Have a bait pulse _ times within a single activation
unlocks_panic_ttp_body: Have a turret surrounded by _ barriers
unlocks_thunder_ttp_body: Hit _ targets with a single smite
statistics_dmgDealt_desc: How much damage you dealt, all damage included.
statistics_kills_desc: How many creatures you brought an end to.
statistics_maxDmg_desc: The highest damage that was dealt to an enemy
statistics_dmgNoped_desc: How much damage was blocked by your shield generators
statistics_dmgTaken_desc: How much damage wasn't blocked by your shield generators
